headline: Agoda and Hoshino Resorts Inc Partnership Unlocks Access to Japan's Premier Hotel Brands
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda joins forces with one of Japan's leading hotel management company Hoshino Resorts Inc to make properties across the group's portfolio accessible on Agoda's platform. This partnership marks a key milestone as Agoda becomes the first digital travel platform to offer properties across Hoshino's entire brand collection, enriching travel experiences within Japan.

content.title: Agoda and Hoshino Resorts Inc Partnership Unlocks Access to Japan's Premier Hotel Brands
content.summary: Digital travel platform Agoda joins forces with one of Japan's leading hotel management company Hoshino Resorts Inc to make properties across the group's portfolio accessible on Agoda's platform. This partnership marks a key milestone as Agoda becomes the first digital travel platform to offer properties across Hoshino's entire brand collection, enriching travel experiences within Japan.

thumbnail.caption: From Left to Right: Jay Lee (Regional Director, Japan & South Korea, Agoda), Satomi Nakabayashi (Country Director Japan, Agoda), Andrew Smith (Senior Vice President, Supply, Agoda) Yoshiharu Hoshino (Chief Executive Officer, Hoshino Resorts Inc), and Aki Yoshikawa (Sales and Distribution Manager, Hoshino Resorts Inc).
